column4: suppose i want to convert a .mp4 movie to .avi... how would i go about doing this?

sorry, i should have put that on the same line
no probs, i laughed at myself anyway
so what do you need mplayer for? :)
it was worth trying to see if it'd play high def video without being choppy
i was trying something like that... well, dropping the resolution to dvd size. unfortunately mplayer threw a wobbly
do you know if vlc have an equivalent of 'framedrop'?
you can muck around with the video output settings in the preferences
usually the advanced section has the fun stuff :)
